HTML.NAME: Script call
HTML.LANG_0:
<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
        //alert("hi");
        SetDomain();
        $('.loginfocus').focus();
        });
        function SetDomain() {
        //alert($("#ddldomains").children('option').length);

        if ($("#ddldomains").children('option').length == 1) {
        $("#ddldomains").css('display', 'none');
        }
        else {
        $("#ddldomains").css('display', 'block');
        }
        }

        $('.loginclick').keypress(function (e) {
        if (e.keyCode == 13) {
        $('.loginclickcall').click();
        }
        });

        $('.loginfocus').keypress(function (e) {
        if (e.keyCode == 13) {
        if (document.getElementsByName("loginid")[0].value == "") {
        $('.loginclickcall').click();
        }
        else {
        $('.loginclick').focus();
        }

        if (document.getElementsByName("loginid")[0].value != "" && document.getElementsByName("password")[0].value != "") {
        $('.loginclickcall').click();
        }
        }
        });

        </script>

Custom Payload

Define your request payload here. you can place parameters within the payload using the @ format

Data

Place raw data for the request here. Could be JSON, XML, etc. You can enter "system-parameters" by typing "@@" and choose from the suggested values. Nothing is parsed for you here (including extra line breaks or spaces -- everything is sent verbatim). You probably need to define a header below corresponding to your data Content-Type.

Header

Key, value pairs to be added as headers in all requests.

HTML.LANG_0:
Mobile Length:

Define minimum and maximum length of mobile number to which an agent an can initiate a chat. The minimum length should be 9 and maximum length should be 15

Editable Footer:

Allow team managers to set a custom footer that will be visible to all the team members of a particular team.

Customer profile masking

Manage the customer information that you want to be masked on IMIchat.
Note:'Data Masking' will be enabled only for those teams that have 'Agent initiated chats' disabled.

External ACD/Router

IMIchat allows you to integrate with external ACD or a router assign chats using our APIs. By using an external ACD, the below mentioned changes will apply to your team settings:

    Chat Panel:
  • Team Queue will be hidden
  • Transfer Chat Option will be disabled
    Case Settings:
  • Auto move to Queue/ON HOLD configurations will be disabled
  • Auto move to Queue on Logout will be disabled.
    Others changes:
  • ON HOLD option will be disabled and close will be made the default option.
  • Accepting Chats toggle will be hidden. By default this would be set to true if agent is logged in.
  • Agents will not be able to pick chats from the search screen.

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {

        //SetDomain();
        InitOnLoad();
		$.material.init();
        $('.loginfocus').focus();
        });
        //    function SetDomain() {
        //        //alert($("#ddldomains").children('option').length);

        //        if ($("#ddldomains").children('option').length == 1) {
        //            $("#ddldomains").css('display', 'none');
        //        }
        //        else {
        //            $("#ddldomains").css('display', 'block');
        //        }
        //    }

        $('.loginclick').keypress(function (e) {
        if (e.keyCode == 13) {
        $('.loginclickcall').click();
        }
        });

        $('.loginfocus').keypress(function (e) {
        if (e.keyCode == 13) {
        if (document.getElementsByName("loginid")[0].value == "") {
        $('.loginclickcall').click();
        }
        else {
        $('.loginclick').focus();
        }

        if (document.getElementsByName("loginid")[0].value != "" && document.getElementsByName("password")[0].value != "") {
        $('.loginclickcall').click();
        }
        }
        });

        </script>

HTML.NAME: Html Code
HTML.LANG_0:
Note: You may refer the below sample regex to mask standard credit card numbers:
^(?:4[0-9]{12}(?:[0-9]{3})?|(?:5[1-5][0-9]{2}|222[1-9]|22[3-9][0-9]|2[3-6][0-9]{2}|27[01][0-9]|2720)[0-9]{12}|3[47][0-9]{13}|3(?:0[0-5]|[68][0-9])[0-9]{11}|6(?:011|5[0-9]{2})[0-9]{12} |(?:2131|1800|35\d{3})\d{11})$

Masking Schedule

Note: 'Mask immediately' masks the matching content immediately where as 'Mask later' masks the matching content after the chat is closed.

HTML.NAME: Html Code tab3widgetvisibility
HTML.LANG_0:
Visibility Rules

Control the visibility of the Livechat button on your website based on the rules you configure.

Working Hours

Control the visibility of Livechat button based on your working hours. By default, the widget will always be visible on all days. You can update the working hours of individual day or un-check a day to make the widget unavailable on that particular day.

 Start Timings End Timings

Banning Visitors

Ban a visitor to reach out to you through Livechat based on the visitor's IP address. IP based blocking would always gain precedence over working hours.
Valid IP address format: xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx (where x ranges from 0- 255)
